text: Sergio Fernando Moro (; born 1 August 1972) is a Brazilian jurist, former federal judge, college professor and politician. He was one of the lead judges in Operation Car Wash."Federal Judge Sérgio Moro, in charge of the proceedings opened under Operation Car Wash"..."The judge reported that the evidence gathered during the operation as well as the allegations given under plea bargain indicate that the payment of bribes through contracts at Petrobras was a common practice." Moro was also Minister of Justice and Public Security under the Jair Bolsonaro administration from 2019 to 2020. He briefly ran for President of Brazil in the 2022 election. Instead, he successfully ran for Senator of Paraná. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian judges Category:Brazilian academics Category:Politicians from Paraná State
title: Sergio Moro
